description: This tender includes various Cable Assemblies, Power Supply, Clamp and Adapters in support of the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) soldier deployments.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender
## MPU5 eFP and Ancillary Items
### Contract Reference: cb-650-20598324, Amendment: 6, Solicitation: W8486-249389/A
#### Tender Announcement: 2023-10-24, Closing Date and Time: 2023-11-16 14:00:00

This Invitation to Tender seeks proposals for the acquisition of MPU5 eFP (Exploitation and Forward) and Ancillary Items to support the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) soldier deployments.

#### Tender Description
The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering a variety of cable assemblies, power supplies, clamps, and adapters to meet the requirements of the CAF.

#### Key Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-24
* **Deadline and Closing Time**: 2023-11-16, 14:00:00
* **Expected Start Date and End Date**: 2023-11-20 and 2023-12-20
* **Trade Agreements**: Supports the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regional Opportunity**: None
* **Delivery Region**: Montreal, Province of Quebec
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-24
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-16
* **Expected Start Date**: 2023-11-20
* **Contract End Date**: 2023-12-20

#### Selection Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

#### Evaluation Method

* A Request for Proposal (RFP) will be issued on [date].
* The evaluation panel will assess submitted proposals based on the specified features.

#### Contract Contact Information

Greg Evans
gregory.evans3@forces.gc.ca
(343) 550-2143

#### Official Documents
The official documents for this tender are available at the following link:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23836/mpu5---rfp.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23836/mpu5---rfp---fr.pdf
